title: cuda() takes a very long time.
body_html:
• OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install pytorch torchvision
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda8.0
  • GPU models and configuration: GTX1060
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): g++-4.9

This is just a feedback. I fixed it with pip install.

body:
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04
- PyTorch version: 0.3.1
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install pytorch torchvision
- Python version: 3.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: cuda8.0
- GPU models and configuration: GTX1060
- GCC version (if compiling from source): g++-4.9

This is just a feedback. I fixed it with pip install.
